nodes.text: Lankashiir was a planet of the Lankashiir system, within the Colonies region of the galaxy. During the Imperial Period, Lankashiir was under the control of the Galactic Empire. A planet thriving with forests, Lankashiir was home to Adion Lang, a lieutenant serving with the Imperial Security Bureau, and the Durasha family, a Human family with strong Imperial ties.

Lankashiir was first mentioned in the Star Wars Adventure Journal 8's short story A Certain Point of View, which was written by Charlene Newcomb and published in November 1, 1995. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the world in grid square N-11.
